snippet: NATO confirmed the death, while the police in the Afghan capital, Kabul, said only that a foreigner was killed after an altercation with a taxi driver near the airport.
abstract: Afghan officials and witnesses say soldier with NATO-led military coalition was stabbed to death in Kabul, but circumstances remain unclear and his nationality has not been released.
lead_paragraph: NATO confirmed the death, while the police in the Afghan capital, Kabul, said only that a foreigner was killed after an altercation with a taxi driver near the airport.

headline.main: Coalition Soldier Is Stabbed to Death in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Coalition Soldier Killed by Attacker With a Knife in Kabul
